          <title>
            <string language="en">Time-of-flight set-up for speed of sound measurement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit-von-Flug installierte für 
Schallgeschwindigkeit Messen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le Temps-de-vol a installé pour la vitesse de la 
mesure du bruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o Tempo-$$$-VÔO set-up para a velocidade da 
medida sadia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il Tempo-de-volo ha installato per velocità 
della misurazione acustica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργάνωση χρόνος-$$$-ΠΤΉΣΗΣ για την ταχύτητα της 
υγιούς μέτρησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el Tiempo-de-vuelo set-up para la velocidad de la
medida sana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the laboratory set-up for speed of sound measurement using the time-of-flight method.</string>
          </description>

          <description>

Schallgeschwindigkeit Messen mit der Zeit-von-Flug Methode installiert
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre le laboratoire installé pour 
la vitesse de la mesure du bruit en utilisant la méthode de 
temps-de-vol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra o laboratório set-up para a
